name: Tinker-Rise of Pathos
description:
Tinker-Rise of Pathos is an adventure game made during Kesäpeliopinnot 2022 course. Tinker is a cat who has to find his way through vicious bandits and collect bolts to upgrade his stats. 

Credits:

Kristian Luukkonen

Emil Hellgren

Antti Jakunaho

Samuel Lappalainen

Kalle Niemi

Aleksi Ignatius
